name: Brighter (Davide A. Fiandra)
description:
THIS IS THE PREMIUM VERSION OF BRIGHTER, MEANING THAT YOU'LL FIND NO ADS HERE! ONLY PURE, UNADULTERATED, GAMEPLAY!

Do you like colours? Do you like squares? Who doesn't!

In brighter you are assaulted by a neverending barrage of coloured squares, and the only way to survive is to defend yourself... with YOUR OWN coloured squares. Sounds exciting right?

Hone your reflexes as the game becomes faster and faster, and try to score as much points as you can!

(It is suggested to play Brighter on a device with 1GB RAM or higher)
